articles.title: A healthy Hampus Lindholm could change Bruins’ fortunes in several areas
articles.description:
"Instead of feeling sorry for myself, try to put that time into improving myself and get better and come  back stronger."

The post A healthy Hampus Lindholm could change Bruins’ fortunes in several areas appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hampus Lindholm aims to return stronger after injury, impacting Bruins' performance.
Lindholm's health could enhance the Bruins' power play effectiveness this season.
Improved play from Lindholm may boost Bruins' chances in the upcoming NHL playoffs.

articles.title: Drake Maye receives a ringing endorsement from Bills QB Josh Allen
articles.description:
"He’s an unbelievable kid, a bright kid. He can spin the heck out of the ball. He moves well."

The post Drake Maye receives a ringing endorsement from Bills QB Josh Allen appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bills QB Josh Allen praised Drake Maye's talent and potential as a future NFL star.
Maye's skills may influence the Patriots' scouting strategies for the upcoming draft.
Boston residents should watch for Maye's performance in college football this season.

articles.title: MBTA debuts train design to honor historic New England railroad, with more on the way
articles.description:
The Boston and Maine Railroad train, complete with a vintage maroon and yellow design, will begin service on the Commuter Rail this week.

The post MBTA debuts train design to honor historic New England railroad, with more on the way appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MBTA launches a new train design honoring the Boston and Maine Railroad this week.
The train features a vintage maroon and yellow design, appealing to local history enthusiasts.
Residents can expect more themed trains in the future, enhancing local commuter experience.

articles.title: Patriots could be facing off against their former 1st-round pick in Miami
articles.description:
Cole Strange is reportedly joining Miami's roster ahead of their matchup against the Patriots.

The post Patriots could be facing off against their former 1st-round pick in Miami appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cole Strange joins Miami Dolphins ahead of Patriots matchup on September 9.
Strange was a first-round pick by the Patriots in 2022.
Boston fans may see a former player compete against their team.

articles.title: Tufts to go tuition-free for families making less than $150K
articles.description:
"This new program underscores our commitment to ensuring that a world-class education is within reach for talented students from all socioeconomic backgrounds," said Tufts University President Sunil Kumar.

The post Tufts to go tuition-free for families making less than $150K appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tufts University will offer tuition-free education for families earning under $150,000.
This initiative aims to increase access for talented students from diverse socioeconomic backgrounds.
Starting in 2025, the program will significantly reduce financial barriers for Boston-area families.
